attributes.action: For COVID-19: The UK government needs to officially close cafe's & restaurants
attributes.additional_details: Officially close such establishments. Allow the insurance industry to take accountability and support the country in its time of need. This is why SME's take out such insurance!
attributes.background:
The PM has not closed cafe's, bars or restaurants but instead, he told the public to stay away. The “denial of access”  clause on insurance policies can't be invoked. 
Jobs are being lost and businesses are closing!

rejection.details:
Since this petition was created, the Government has announced that bars, cafes and restaurants are to close. It has also asked everyone to stay at home. You can find out more here: https://www.gov.uk/coronavirus

You can find out more about how to protect yourself and others from coronavirus here: https://www.nhs.uk/conditions/coronavirus-covid-19/
